remarks: Deduction from extensionality principle for relations, given an equivalence only on the relation's domain and range.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Nov-2017.)
statement:
eqbrrdva.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ ( C X. D ) ) $.
eqbrrdva.2 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ ( C X. D ) ) $.
eqbrrdva.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. C /\ y e. D ) -> ( x A y <-> x B y ) ) $.
eqbrrdva $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ph x y $.
